Q: Sydney works as a preschool teacher, and helped trace Robin's fingers. Why did Sydney do this? 
  choice: Make artwork
  choice: Make popcorn
  choice: Teach her class the alphabet
A:

Q: Ash had sandwiches to eat every day and he started to feel sick and bloated, and also feel tired. How would Ash feel afterwards? 
  choice: Energized
  choice: Healthy and lean
  choice: Sick and bloated
A:
targets: A person who can act the part if needed
multiple_choice_targets: Sydney would need to be evil

inputs:
Q: Robin swings the car door open after they arrive to the new mall in town. What does Robin need to do before this? 
  choice: Get into a car
  choice: Go inside the mall
  choice: Shop at the mall
A:
multiple_choice_targets: Relieved that the process was over

inputs:
Q: After seeing them go 95 mph, Aubrey pulled them over for speeding on a 55 mph highway. How would Others feel after? 
  choice: Happy about court
  choice: Happy about the ticket
  choice: More cautious

  choice: Cheated
  choice: Happy
  choice: Unappreciated
A:

Q: Aubrey wrote Tracy's novel because Tracy was a well known author but didn't have very much talent. What will Aubrey want to do next? 
  choice: Avoid taking credit for the work
  choice: Read the novel
  choice: Take credit for the work
A:

Q: Remy gave the board Casey's interpretation of the facts about the case they had accepted. How would Casey feel as a result? 
  choice: Like running away
  choice: Pleased of the presentation
  choice: Relieved to have help
A:

  choice: Go on a date
  choice: Have a romantic meal
  choice: Loved

inputs:

  choice: Spend time with Taylor

Q: Carson was at a friend's house playing video games to get away from his arguing parents. What does Carson need to do before this? 
  choice: Run over to his friends house
  choice: Stretch out the time at their friends
  choice: Try a different game

Q: Austin got extra help with the homework from his tutor since he was falling behind in class. What will the tutor want to do next? 
  choice: Do their own homework on time
  choice: Realize he was doing poorly in class
  choice: Review homework with Austin
A:

Q: When Riley noticed Jesse, he stared at him with suspicious eyes. What will Jesse want to do next? 
  choice: Avoid Riley
  choice: Saw Jesse wearing Riely's brand new sweater
  choice: Thinks that Jesse stole their sex partner
A:

Q: Taylor was best friends with her childhood neighbor and after years of being such good friends, Taylor married the neighbor. How would Others feel as a result? 
  choice: A good friend
  choice: Happy for the couple
  choice: Happy for the house
A:

Q: Carson was wrongfully convicted for a crime. Taylor proved Carson's point last night and the judge agreed. What will happen to Carson? 
  choice: Be released
  choice: Be rewarded
  choice: Be upset
A:

  choice: Ashamed
  choice: Like he fits in
  choice: Silly

Lose interest in interacting with others
